6. If any of the individual years match, consider that period as a valid span of years for which he played for the Jazz.
7. Repeat steps 4 to 6 for both periods (1995-2000 and 2004-2005) and ensure they are covered in the table's data.
8. Combine the results of each period to form a final conclusion about the claim.
